thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Pdc Energy Announces Year-End 2017 Proved Reserves Of About 453 MMBOE, Including Nearly 100 MMBOE In Delaware Basin

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pdc Energy Announces Year-End 2017 Proved Reserves Of About 453 MMBOE, Including Nearly 100 MMBOE In Delaware Basin
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Pdc Energy Inc:
* PDC ENERGY ANNOUNCES YEAR-END 2017 PROVED RESERVES OF APPROXIMATELY 453 MMBOE, INCLUDING NEARLY 100 MMBOE IN DELAWARE BASIN
* PDC ENERGY INC - ANTICIPATED 2017 PRODUCTION OF 31.8 MMBOE WITH ESTIMATED 2017 OIL PRODUCTION OF 12.9 MM BARRELS
* PDC ENERGY INC - ANTICIPATED Q4 2017 OIL PRODUCTION OF OVER 40,400 BARRELS PER DAY
* PDC ENERGY INC - ANTICIPATED DECEMBER 2017 PRODUCTION EXIT RATE OF 97,000 BARRELS OF OIL EQUIVALENT (“BOE”) PER DAY.
* PDC ENERGY INC - ANTICIPATED 2017 CAPITAL INVESTMENT OF APPROXIMATELY $790 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
